mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD (FREE_BNO, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_AREA) VALUES (SEQ_FREE_BNO.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardContent}, #{boardArea})

INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD (FREE_BNO, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_AREA, NOTICE) VALUES (SEQ_FREE_BNO.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardContent}, #{boardArea}, 1)
mapper.select:
SELECT FB.*,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOTWEEK H WHERE H.FREE_BNO = FB.FREE_BNO) AS "COUNT", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY R WHERE R.FREE_BNO = FB.FREE_BNO) AS "REPLY_COUNT" FROM FREE_BOARD FB WHERE STATUS='Y' AND NOTICE=0
AND BOARD_AREA = #{state}
AND ( BOARD_TITLE like '%' || #{search} || '%' OR BOARD_WRITER like '%' || #{search} || '%' OR BOARD_CONTENT like '%' || #{search} || '%' )
ORDER BY FB.NOTICE DESC, COUNT DESC, FB.BOARD_DATE DESC
ORDER BY FB.NOTICE DESC, REPLY_COUNT DESC, FB.BOARD_DATE DESC
ORDER BY FB.NOTICE DESC, FB.BOARD_DATE DESC
ORDER BY FB.BOARD_DATE DESC

SELECT FB.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOTWEEK H WHERE H.FREE_BNO = FB.FREE_BNO) AS "COUNT", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY R WHERE R.FREE_BNO = FB.FREE_BNO) AS "REPLY_COUNT" FROM FREE_BOARD FB WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE = 1 ORDER BY FB.BOARD_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET BLIND = 'Y' WHERE FREE_BNO IN (SELECT FREE_BNO FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_TYPE = '자유게시판' GROUP BY FREE_BNO HAVING COUNT(FREE_BNO) >= 5)
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, FREE_BNO, BOARD_TITLE FROM (SELECT FREE_BNO, BOARD_TITLE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOTWEEK H WHERE H.FREE_BNO = FB.FREE_BNO) AS "COUNT" FROM FREE_BOARD FB ORDER BY COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < 4

SELECT FREE_BNO, BOARD_TITLE, F.MEMBER_NO, BOARD_WRITER, PROFILE_IMAGE, BOARD_AREA, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE FROM FREE_BOARD F LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON F.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE F.STATUS = 'Y' AND FREE_BNO = #{fno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_NO, MEMBER_NO, FREE_BNO, REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_REP_NO.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{freeBno}, #{replyContent})
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO, FREE_BNO, R.MEMBER_NO, PROFILE_IMAGE, NICKNAME, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DATE FROM REPLY R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND FREE_BNO = ${freeBno} ORDER BY R.REPLY_DATE
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = '${boardTitle}', BOARD_CONTENT = '${boardContent}' WHERE FREE_BNO = '${boardNo}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT (REPORT_NO, FREE_BNO, MEMBER_NO, REPORT_USER_NO, REPORT_CONTENT, REPORT_TYPE) VALUES (SEQ_REP_NO.NEXTVAL, ${reportFno}, ${reportedPerson}, ${reporter}, '${reportContent}', '자유게시판')
INSERT INTO HOTWEEK(FREE_BNO, MEMBER_NO, COUNT_DATE) VALUES (#{freeBoardNo},#{memberNo},SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT FREE_BNO, BOARD_AREA, BOARD_TITLE FROM FREE_BOARD F JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = F.MEMBER_NO WHERE F.STATUS = 'Y' AND GRADE != 'ADMIN'
AND BOARD_AREA = '${sggNm}'
